#summary Installing and setting up spotSHOUT.

= Installation =

The installation is straightforward. You basically download the spotSHOUT JAR and point into your Sun SPOT Project and install the spotSHOUT NetBeans Plugins. Here are the steps:

  # Download the spotSHOUT JAR, SRC and NetBeans Plugin in the [http://code.google.com/p/spotshout/downloads/list download section].
  # To make the spotSHOUT middleware avaliable to your project edit the build.properties file of it (It's on the root of the Project).  
{{{ 
utility.jars=C:/path/to/spotSHOUT-0.0.1.jar
}}}
